title: 108 Divine Seeds: Seeds to Lead and Succeed in Life
description: 108 Divine Seeds is a collection of 108 quotations by Ashwani Deswal.Each page of this thoughtful book having a quote explained by the author, will take your consciousness on the fundamentals of the most important aspects of your life. You need to take every quote (seed), insight and align yourself mentally, physically, emotionally and spiritually. And you do so by internalizing them with necessary consistent actions to awaken these seeds to flower and fill your life with success and fulfillment. Itâ€™s a beautiful and timeless gift of wisdom, for a loved one or for yourself.The wisdom imbibed in those 108 quotes will empower you to Live your life to the fullest, Boost your self esteem, Tune in with positive vibrations, Rejuvenate your approach to life, Live with greater joy & fulfillment, Turn Your Potentialities into Reality & Create constructive thoughts and emotions
author: Ashwani Deswal
